title: Well, the worst time i've ever had playing league of legends was just topped
body:
since i'm level 28 and have won an ASTOUNDING 19 GAMES AND LOST 18 my mmr is apparently so FUCKING HIGH that if i queue for 5v5 i MUST play against level 30 diamonds with level 30 bronze players

so i queue for 3s

10 minutes in our khazix afks

the ashe holds me hostage for FIFTY THREE ADDITIONAL MINUTES as we are against a bard, zac, and j4 who is a bot 

what the actual fuck, like i can't report any of these people, i can't afk or i get leaver buster banned, i can't win or lose the game any faster without it being reportable

holy hell what a miserable time
